feed.title: Snubs
feed.subtitle: Film nerds and hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films snubbed at the Oscars. Alternating each week, one host must convince the other of their favorite films' deserved nomination. They discuss Oscar films and their competitive awards years, while also trying to make each other laugh.

author.name: High Tops Media & Caroline Young, Chris Masciarelli

entry.title: Bones and All - Season 2 Episode 13
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Luca Guadangino’s Bones and All, and the 2023 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline loves Luca and Stuhlbarg and Chris is all set on this one.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: The Doors - Season 2 Episode 12
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Oliver Stone’s The Doors, and the 1992 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline wouldn’t touch Jim Morrison with a 10 foot pole, and Chris is in love with Val Kilmer #NewShipAlert.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire - Season 2 Episode 11

link.title: Portrait of a Lady on Fire - Season 2 Episode 11

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Celine Sciamma’s Portrait of a Lady on Fire, and the 2020 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline goes overseas for this pick and Chris still hasn’t watched Call Me By Your Name.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Tombstone - Season 2 Episode 10
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss George P. Cosmatos’ Tombstone, and the 1994 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is out for blood and Chris should know better by now.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer - Season 2 Episode 9

link.title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer - Season 2 Episode 9

entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Yorgos Lanthimos’ The Killing of a Sacred Deer, and the 2018 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline thinks the vibes are “radonk” and Chris thinks that’s the funniest thing she’s ever said.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: The Founder - Season 2 Episode 8
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss John Lee Hancock’s The Founder, and the 2017 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline wants the Coen Brothers to give this one a go and Chris says “late stage capitalism” a lot.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: American Psycho - Season 2 Episode 7
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Mary Harron’s American Psycho, and the 2001 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline wants to bring back problematic faves and Chris wants everyone to know that Caroline chose this movie.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Midsommar - Season 2 Episode 6
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Ari Aster’s Midsommar, and the 2019 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline is out on Dickens and Chris still sucks at recasting.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: The Last Duel - Season 2 Episode 5
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss Ridley Scott’s The Last Duel and the 2021 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline loves Adam Driver and Chris can speak Japanese but not French. Oh and Ben Affleck has medieval bleach blonde hair.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

entry.title: Burn After Reading - Season 2 Episode 4
entry.content:
On Snubs, film fans and co-hosts, Caroline Young and Chris Masciarelli, discuss their favorite films that were snubbed by the Oscars. On this episode, our titular hosts discuss The Coen Brothers’ Burn After Reading and the 2009 Academy Awards it was noticeably absent from. Caroline thinks Ron Howard is overrated and Chris wants Queen Consort Camilla on the $2 bill.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/snubspod/

A High Tops Media Podcast
